title: Beneath the Guarding Stars
description: Fear is quiet. It waits for me beneath the guarding stars.Ava and Michael have fought their way to Starsgard, a mysterious and secluded country powered by plant technology. But crossing the border comes with a price and their home country is ravaged by fear and hatred of mortals. They soon discover that peace is an illusion and danger is closer than they feared.Set in an alternate version of today’s Earth where everyone is invincible… except one girl.Beneath the Guarding Stars is the second book in an action-packed four-book series.
author: Everly Frost
